players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
Diana was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
You: "Diana is dead. We need to analyze who voted for whom yesterday and share any info we have."
Bob: "I investigated Charlie last night and he is the mafioso. We should vote him out today."
Charlie: "Bob is lying. I investigated Alice last night and she is the mafioso. We must vote for Alice."
Charlie: "Bob is clearly the mafioso trying to frame me. I investigated Alice and she's clean. We should vote Bob out."
Bob: "Charlie is lying. I'm the detective and he is mafioso. Check the voting - he's trying to save himself by accusing me."
You: "Bob, if you're the detective, why did you wait until now to share your investigation? Charlie shared his immediately. I'm leaning towards voting Charlie based on consistency."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Alice
Charlie was arrested

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
Diana was found dead.
You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
Alice: "Diana is dead. We need to analyze who voted for whom yesterday and share any info we have."
You: "I investigated Charlie last night and he is the mafioso. We should vote him out today."
Charlie: "Bob is lying. I investigated Alice last night and she is the mafioso. We must vote for Alice."
Charlie: "Bob is clearly the mafioso trying to frame me. I investigated Alice and she's clean. We should vote Bob out."
You: "Charlie is lying. I'm the detective and he is mafioso. Check the voting - he's trying to save himself by accusing me."
Alice: "Bob, if you're the detective, why did you wait until now to share your investigation? Charlie shared his immediately. I'm leaning towards voting Charlie based on consistency."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Alice
Charlie was arrested

players.name: Charlie
memory: You're Charlie, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Diana.
Diana was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Alice: "Diana is dead. We need to analyze who voted for whom yesterday and share any info we have."
Bob: "I investigated Charlie last night and he is the mafioso. We should vote him out today."
You: "Bob is lying. I investigated Alice last night and she is the mafioso. We must vote for Alice."
You: "Bob is clearly the mafioso trying to frame me. I investigated Alice and she's clean. We should vote Bob out."
Bob: "Charlie is lying. I'm the detective and he is mafioso. Check the voting - he's trying to save himself by accusing me."
Alice: "Bob, if you're the detective, why did you wait until now to share your investigation? Charlie shared his immediately. I'm leaning towards voting Charlie based on consistency."
